subject: Re: Order #SSN3964, how did it go?
description_text:
Man, I don’t get my full order I got only 1 of 2 sets of pedals and only 1
of 2 linear reactor


CAN I GET ANY UPDATE WHEN DO YOU SEND ME MY MISSING ORDER



W dniu pt., 19 gru 2025 o 21:30 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> napisał(a):

conversations.body_text: Hi artur okupniak,    Is there a problem with the product you received? I noticed it matches what you purchased.

Yes

I ordered and paid for TWO sets not for one



W dniu pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:19 service@simsonn.com
Hi artur okupniak,  We apologize for the inconvenience caused and will resend your order as soon as possible.

thank's

please sent this with express delivery

pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:25 service@simsonn.com

and another issue, haptic set came without USB PC cable

pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:26 artur okupniak <artur.okupniak@gmail.com>
napisał(a):

> thank's
>
> please sent this with express delivery
>
> pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:25 service@simsonn.com

Please sent link to track this package

Thanks

W dniu pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:25 service@simsonn.com

Hello?

Can You tell me are my order is already send ?



W dniu pon., 15 gru 2025 o 12:03 artur okupniak <artur.okupniak@gmail.com>
napisał(a):

> Please sent link to track this package
>
> Thanks
>
> W dniu pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:25 service@simsonn.com
ID 为 7993 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7993  
      主题: SRM#1772  
      描述:  Hi  
   
 I order haptic Simsonn van pro 2x 
 And VAM linear 2x  
   
 And only get one set

Hi,

any update about my missing order? still waiting

pt., 12 gru 2025 o 13:25 service@simsonn.com
Hi artur okupniak,  We sincerely apologize for the missing items in your order. They should have already been reshipped, and we will provide you with the tracking number tomorrow.

Hi artur okupniak,    We have arranged for a replacement shipment for you. It appears the warehouse has not yet dispatched it, and we will follow up on your behalf.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2535100706988407
